TopicTitle: Get into an equal orbit WITHOUT RCS!

Articles.Content:
All you need to do is achieve this objective and tape it so I can see it.

Also, NO MECHJEB ALOUD.

Edited August 8, 2012 by Mr. Me
What do you mean 'Equal'? A perfectly circular orbit? That\'s neigh impossible even with RCS.

What do you mean 'Equal'? A perfectly circular orbit? That\'s neigh impossible even with RCS.

I can usually get within 30 metres of perfection without it.

Yeah. Chute, pod, decoupler, ASAS, 4 tanks, and a gimbaling engine with some (optional) strap on SRB\'s will do this easily. I can\'t do it within 30 meters like Ping, but still, back in the day we orbited with no map, rcs, asas, or strap on liquids, or even struts!

Not the most difficult challenge! :
KurtJMac got within something like 5 meters of perfect geostationary (synchronite?) orbit.
